Package org.archive.crawler.fetcher

Class Summary
FetchDNS Processor to resolve 'dns:' URIs.
FetchFTP Fetches documents and directory listings using FTP.
FetchHTTP HTTP fetcher that uses Apache Jakarta Commons HttpClient library.
HeritrixHttpMethodRetryHandler Retry handler that tries ten times to establish connection and then once established, if a GET method, tries ten times to get response (If POST, it tries once only).
HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory Version of protocol socket factory that tries to get IP from heritrix IP cache -- if its been set into the HttpConnectionParameters.
HeritrixSSLProtocolSocketFactory Implementation of the commons-httpclient SSLProtocolSocketFactory so we can return SSLSockets whose trust manager is ConfigurableX509TrustManager.
